original_title: The Making of Disney MGM Studios Theme Park
overview: Produced by Tampa's WTVT in 1989, now FOX 13 Tampa, “The Making of… The Disney-MGM Studios Theme Park” was hosted by Fred Newman.  He also hosted the “All New Mickey Mouse Club” from 1989-1994 which was filmed at the Studios.  The behind the scenes special includes a storyline featuring Fred Newman going undercover to find out what this Hollywood in Florida is all about.  The Storyline is a little corny in retrospect, but the interviews with Imagineers and construction images more than make up for the storyline.
title: The Making of Disney MGM Studios Theme Park
